headline: Yum! Brands to Accelerate AI Innovation in an Industry-First Collaboration With NVIDIA
summary: LOUISVILLE, Ky., March 18, 2025--Yum! Brands announced that it is partnering with NVIDIA to accelerate the development of innovative AI technologies for restaurants around the globe.

raw.headline: Yum! Brands to Accelerate AI Innovation in an Industry-First Collaboration With NVIDIA
raw.summary: LOUISVILLE, Ky., March 18, 2025--Yum! Brands announced that it is partnering with NVIDIA to accelerate the development of innovative AI technologies for restaurants around the globe.

headline: Thanks to Nvidia, AI Will Soon Take Your Order at Taco Bell and Pizza Hut
summary: Yum Brands  owner of Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, KFC and Habit Burger & Grill, announced today it is partnering with  Nvidia  to build a range of new AI-driven services in its restaurants.  The first—AI-powered voice-ordering at the drive-through lane and on the phone—was built by Yum’s developers using tools and development frameworks from Nvidia, and will begin rolling out at 500 restaurants across the portfolio in the second quarter of this year.  The ultimate goal is to move all orders through digital channels instead of human order-takers, an effort Yum says will boost sales.

The ultimate goal is to move all orders through digital channels instead of human order-takers, an effort Yum says will boost sales.
